member.name: P:Kentico.Kontent.Delivery.DefaultRetryPolicyOptions.MaxCumulativeWaitTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum cumulative wait time. If the cumulative wait time exceeds this value, the client will stop retrying and return the error to the application. The default value is 30 seconds.
